channel.title: I need help its a money problem in my server!--pics to help!--(fixed!)
channel.description:
this is (pi project insanity 602/317) in my server im not!!! advertising!! but say u can goto it n look n u see www.thestaticgame.com/about.html when u make new guy u get all 25 spots with 1 coin say ur in the bank u put coins in they goto 25 if u pull it out goes to all the slots in ur bag idk how to fix i looked every where
[img]http://i1280.photobucket.com/albums/a497/thestaticgame/bank_zpse6d5aab3.png[/img] [img]http://i1280.photobucket.com/albums/a497/thestaticgame/csh_zpscebae2dd.png[/img]
if u need info on files please tell me i add in code dont worry lol! i tried to fix idk what im doing wrong!

item.title: I need help its a money problem in my server!--pics to help!--(fixed!)
item.dc:creator: @thomashawkins4866 thomashawkins4866
item.description:
@thomashawkins4866 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:485561”]Read your posts. It’s in all caps…
That’s like the definition of being pissed on the interwebs.

See where it says:

                                if (c == 0) {
                                        itemIsNote[counter] = true;

add this directly under it:
itemStackable[995] = true;

If that doesn’t work, add it under:
itemIsNote[counter] = false;[/quote]
lol thank you buddy but it was because i was trying to load my data files and they r not in my cache i fixed it thank u for ur help.

Read full topic

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Read your posts. It’s in all caps…
That’s like the definition of being pissed on the interwebs.

See where it says:

                                if (c == 0) {
                                        itemIsNote[counter] = true;

add this directly under it:
itemStackable[995] = true;

If that doesn’t work, add it under:
itemIsNote[counter] = false;

item.title: I need help its a money problem in my server!--pics to help!--(fixed!)
item.dc:creator: @thomashawkins4866 thomashawkins4866
item.description:
@thomashawkins4866 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:485561”][quote author=thomashawkins4866 link=topic=603793.msg4223484#msg4223484 date=1360897228]
THERE WASNT NOTHING IN THERE ABOUT [995] I TRIED ADDING N EVERYWHERE I ADD GET A ERROR
[/quote]
I’m done helping you. If you’re just going to get pissed. You can get off these forums.[/quote]
im not getting pissed?
this is what i have under file

[code] public static boolean[] itemStackable = new boolean[Config.ITEM_LIMIT];
public static boolean[] itemIsNote = new boolean[Config.ITEM_LIMIT];
public static int[] targetSlots = new int[Config.ITEM_LIMIT];
static {
int counter = 0;
int c;

	try {
		FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File

(“c:/602cache/Data/data/stackable.dat”));
while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
if (c == 0) {
itemStackable[counter] = true;
} else {
itemStackable[counter] = false;
}
counter++;
}
dataIn.close();
} catch (IOException e) {
System.out.println(“Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace:”);
e.printStackTrace();
}

	counter = 0;
	
	try {
		FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File

(“c:/602cache/Data/data/notes.dat”));
while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
if (c == 0) {
itemIsNote[counter] = true;
} else {
itemIsNote[counter] = false;
}
counter++;
}
dataIn.close();
} catch (IOException e) {
System.out.println(“Critical error while loading notedata! Trace:”);
e.printStackTrace();
}

	counter = 0;
	try {
		FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File

("./Data/data/equipment.dat"));
while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
targetSlots[counter++] = c;
}
dataIn.close();
} catch (IOException e) {
System.out.println(“Critical error while loading notedata! Trace:”);
e.printStackTrace();
}

	/*try {
        BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("c:/602cache/data/data/equipment.dat"));
		String name = null;
        while ((name = in.readLine()) != null) {
            int itemId = Integer.parseInt(name.substring(0, name.indexOf(":")));
            int equipId = Integer.parseInt(name.substring(name.indexOf(":") + 1));
            targetSlots[itemId] = equipId;
        }
        in.close();
        in = null;
    } catch (Exception e) {
        System.out.println("Error loading equipment list.");
    }*/

}

}[/code] around what u told me to look for bud but i wasnt getting pissed wtf?

Read full topic

item.title: I need help its a money problem in my server!--pics to help!--(fixed!)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

thomashawkins4866:

YES HOW DO I SWITCH IT BACK LOL

Don’t get pissy. No one likes to help you then.

Go to item.java
Search: public static boolean[] itemStackable (or similar)
add: (or look for itemStackable[995] = false;)
itemStackable[995] = true;

If it’s already added as false, set it to true.

Edit: there should be a list of things that have itemStackable[XXXX] = true;
Yours needs to be added there.

Read full topic
